name: Felix Zeppenfeld
coverLetter: I have had some experience in harvesting weed in Germany. Friends of mine recommended me to trimming work. I am very motivated to work full time and improve my performance every day. Looking for a place to put up my tent and one or two meals a day. Ready to work 6 or 7 days a week. I am a reliable German guy looking for a good job to do until the end of season.
